name: Projection Plane
description:
Projection Plane is the winner of the X edition of the GamejamAlicante !

The jam's theme was "Projection".

The objective of the game is to reach the goal in each of the levels.

The main mechanics is the movement of a plane in a 3D environment that cuts the scene. The player has the power to project the 3D scene on the 2D plane to make its way through the levels.

Better played with a controller Credits Programming

Toni Rebollo Berná

Enrique Moltó Ferré

Level Design

Ángel Rebollo Berná
